text: Bryan Guy Adams (born November 5, 1959) is a British-Canadian rock musician. He is known for the songs Summer of '69 and (Everything I Do) I Do It For You. He has performed with many other musical artists such as Def Leppard, Tina Turner, Sting, Rod Stewart, Bonnie Raitt, Barbra Streisand and Melanie C. His best-selling albums are Reckless, Waking Up the Neighbours and 18 til I Die. == Discography == Release year Album CAN chart UK chart US chart 1980 Bryan Adams 75 -- -- 1981 You Want It You Got It 50 78 118 1983 Cuts Like a Knife 8 21 8 1984 Reckless 1 7 1 1986 Into the Fire 2 10 7 1991 Waking Up the Neighbours 1 1 6 1996 18 til I Die 2 1 31 1998 On a Day Like Today 3 11 103 2004 Room Service 2 4 134 2008 11 1 6 80 2014 Tracks of My Years 2015 Get Up 2019 Shine a Light 2022 Pretty Woman - The Musical 2022 So Happy It Hurts 2022 Classic ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian rock musicians Category:Canadian singer-songwriters Category:Canadian Grammy Award winners Category:Musicians from Kingston, Ontario
title: Bryan Adams
